column4: (20:14:08) Llewxam: just the prob i'm having is that i just updated to 5.0.1 - probably that's the problem, you updated iOS
so the libimobile drivers don't support latest ios? :s
it supports latest iOS, when ubuntu was released, and then a new iOS update is released thath broke the support; apples don't like to play others than apples
well ... poo. >.< i'll figure out how to put all my music back in then. loved using rythmbox for that.
